topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae366f6368727efceb0300#post_54ae366f6368727efceb0300
Some more Super robot wars Alpha EVA stuff.

[spoiler]The most powerful incarnation of Getter robo One-shots Bardiel, Allowing Toji to survive intact and to dampen the impact of Shinji's Breakdown.

The original villains influenced Gendo to read the dead sea scrolls.

Asuka defeated the rest of the titans from Zeta gundam before the MP EVAs showed up. (Also, The titans apparently kept getting sent after NERV for some reason)

Alberto the shockwave from Giant robo: the animation fights Sachiel to a standstill with his bare hands.

Shinji rejected his father's ambitions and declares to the world that he's his own person before he fights Gendo.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae3c406368726537033b00#post_54ae3c406368726537033b00
Officially, Just a couple with only original Characters. (A couple have been fan translated, And they're all similar enough that you could play one in japanese after you finish one of those)

Unfortunately, None of the fan translated ones have Evangelion in the cast. (The first alpha game is being worked on, But I doubt that will be finished for awhile.)
